document.id: Pueblo de San Ildefonso Council Res. No. SI-R20-028
document.heading: PUEBLO DE SAN ILDEFONSO COUNCIL RESOLUTION NO. SI-R20-028
Grievance Policy Revision Act
document.preamble: At a duly called meeting of the Council of San Ildefonso Pueblo on the 29th day of December, 2020, the following resolution was adopted:

recital.text: the Pueblo de San Ildefonso has a law and order code; and,
the Pueblo has a Personnel Policy in the code; and,
the Personnel Policy has a Grievance Policy called Section 705 Grievances and Appeals; and,
the Council and Administration had started to revise and update the Personnel Policy and found that the Grievance Policy needs to be revised; and,
the Council and the Administration have worked to modify and update the Grievance Policy.
that the Council hereby approves this act to change Section 705 Grievances and Appeals to read as the attached Section 705 Grievances and Appeals.

procedural-data.text: The foregoing resolution was duly voted upon by the Council on December 29, 2020, at a meeting with a vote of 7 in favor, 0 opposed, 1 abstaining and 2 absent (Governor presiding and not voting) pursuant to the authority vested in the Council by the Agreement of the Pueblo de San Ildefonso.
DELIVERY OF THE RESOLUTION TO THE GOVERNOR:

Resolution No. SI-R20-028 was presented to the Governor of the Pueblo de San Ildefonso on the 29th day of December, 2020, pursuant to the Governing document of the Pueblo de San Ildefonso ("Agreement"), GOVERNOR, Sec. 4(c), and will become effective after signature by the Governor or veto override by the Council.

section.heading: Short Title
section.text: This enactment shall be known as "GRIEVANCE POLICY REVISON ACT (Act)".

section.heading: Purpose
section.text: The purpose of this act is to modify and update Section 705 Grievances and Appeals of the Personnel Policy as contained in the Law and Order Code.

para.text: The Pueblo de San Ildefonso has a law and order code; and
The Pueblo has a Personnel Policy in the code; and
The Personnel Policy has a Grievance Policy called Section 705 Grievances and Appeals; and
The Council and Administration had started to revise and update the Personnel Policy and found that the Grievance Policy needs to be revised; and
The Council and the Administration has worked to modify and update the Grievance Policy.

section.heading: Authorizations
section.text: The Council hereby passes this Act to change Section 705 Grievances and Appeals to read as the attached Section 705 Grievances and Appeals.
